{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD SXT Lite |revision=2 (SXT2nDr2) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/04/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=TV7SXT-2ND |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.38 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 3; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:0C:42 |oui_eth=00:0C:42 }} :[https://routerboard.com/RBSXT2NDR2 Product page]
2x 10dBi antenna gain
The FCC internal photos and FCC sample label show :MACs with an OUI of 00:0C:42 ([[MikroTik]]).
Default credentials are per the FCC ''manual''.
